entry.title: [CA][Control panel] - Manager
entry.content:
May 15, 17:17 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/05/2023 14:30 UTC
End Time : 15/05/2023 16:32 UTC
Service impact : OVHcloud manager (https://ca.ovh.com/manager/) was temporarily inaccessible for users in Canada
Root cause : The incident was caused by an internal configuration problem
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 15, 15:58 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 15/05/2023 14:30 UTC
Service impact : OVHcloud manager (https://ca.ovh.com/manager/) is temporarily inaccessible for users in Canada
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][Customer Services] - ServiceNow OneGate(CSM)
entry.content:
May 11, 21:35 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

May 11, 21:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

May 11, 11:39 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 11/05/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 11/05/2023 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Session disconnection, with obligation to reconnect for one minute.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will do an update on the ServiceNow OneGate.
Workaround : Help Center remains accessible : https://help.ovhcloud.com along with the Manager https://www.ovh.com/manager . If you have a Business or Enterprise level of support, your dedicated phone number is available to reach you technical advisor in case of emergency.

entry.title: [EU][Control Panel] - Customer account authentication
entry.content:
Apr 28, 10:38 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/04/2023 07:12 UTC
End time : 28/04/2023 10:23 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.

Apr 28, 10:17 UTC
Update - A mitigation has been applied since 10H06 UTC

Apr 28, 10:15 UTC
Update - 2FA by SMS is temporarily disabled, if you have 2FA by SMS on your account, you can use another 2FA factor if you have configured one, or your backup codes which will have been provided during the activation of the 2FA SMS

Apr 28, 10:13 UTC
Update - 2FA SMS is unreachable.

Apr 28, 10:03 UTC
Update - Connection to the support portal may have some malfunctions.

Apr 28, 08:47 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Apr 28, 08:45 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 28/04/2023 07:12 UTC
Service impact : We're currently having a malfunction with the authentication workflow for the customers, customers may hit transient 503 errors from time to time when logging in to the customer panel.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [CA][Support] - Call support
entry.content:
Mar 26, 19:51 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
End Time : 26/03/2023 18:54 UTC
Root cause : A delay on a voice gateway caused the issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Mar 26, 18:54 UTC
Monitoring - Ongoing actions : All support numbers are now reachable through English and French language options.
Our teams are currently monitoring the situation.

Mar 26, 18:33 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 25/03/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : Some customers who try to contact us through our support numbers (1-855-685-5463 and the Premium number), won't be able to get through our support if they chose the French language option.
Customers will need to choose the English language option to in order to contact our support.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Customer Panel][Order funnel][API][corporate websites] - TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 End of Life
entry.content:
Feb 15, 10:36 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 15, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 1, 01:39 UTC
Update - The scope has been broadened.
The components affected are now also in Canada.

Jan 30, 23:14 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/02/2023 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/02/2023 23:59 UTC
Service impact : Customers using outdated OS or browsers with only TLSv1.0 and TLSv1.1 capability will no longer be able to reach our commercial website and the customer panel.
Service improvement : On Wednesday February 15th 2023, OVHcloud will change the TLS configuration of its corporate websites endpoints and customer panel. This
change is performed to stick with industry security standards, we recommend that you upgrade your OS and browser to make sure you use at least TLSv1.2.
